Title: Pretty, femine
Review: I really like the dress, the material, the print and the pleated skirt are totally fun. however, the neckline is a bit to low, and a cami is necessary, at least for me. the material is very sheer, which will be noted on the sleeves and the lower skirt where the liner falls short ( about 4 inches above the knee).the main draw back i personally have with this dress is taking it off. there are no zippers or buttons. getting it on is easy, not so when taking it off!
Review_ja: 素材、プリント、プリーツスカートなど、とても楽しいドレスです。しかし、ネックラインが少し低めで、少なくとも私にとってはキャミが必要です。

Review: Love the quality of this material, and how the lines fall on the back. i got a a medium petite because the small was sold out, and i like how it fits. petite sits around the hip area and it's not too long which i like. the color is definitely more of an orange/tangerine color - not red. great cover up sweater!
Review_ja: この素材の質感と、背中のラインが気に入っています。Sサイズが売り切れていたので、Mサイズのプチサイズを購入しましたが、フィット感があって気に入っています。

Title: Even prettier in person
Review: I purchased the purple motif in petite size small. it hits just the right length for me, but i can see that if i were any larger chested, it might be an issue. (for reference, i'm a 32d, 5'4, 112lb.) it's very forgiving on the tummy area, without looking bulky (other moms know what i'm talking about and understand my appreciation for this). the shirt is also a nice quality, really comfortable, and it's easy to wear with jeans, shorts, skirts, etc., making it a welcome versatile piece.
Review_ja: パープルのモチーフのプチサイズSを購入しました。私にはちょうどいい長さですが、これ以上胸が大きかったら問題かもしれません。(参考までに、私は32d、170cm、112lbです。）それはかさばることなく、おなかの領域に非常に寛容です（他の母親は私が何を言っているか知っているとこのための私の感謝を理解しています）シャツも良い品質、本当に快適で、それは歓迎万能作品作り、ジーンズ、ショートパンツ、スカートなどで着用するのは簡単です。

Review: Wow im really glad i didn't listen to the negative reviews! in ordered this top in the black and red and i have to say this is one of my favorite tops! the neck line i agree does need to be secured. i wish they would have added a snap. it's fine though as i don't mind sewing it closed. this top is worth it! i'm 5'2 108 lbs and small chested. so for slim girls i think this is perfect!

Title: Very pretty
Review: True to size, very pretty.  as pictured expect that it is more peachy and not this light.  i like it and will keep it but just be aware that it is not a pale pink as in the picture.
Review_ja: 写真通りですが、もっとピーチっぽく、こんなに明るくないです。

Title: Love it!
Review:
I bought this in june on a sale and am so glad that i did. it''s so pretty and classy. the neck has stretch so it's not tight at all. it's styled like a swing top, but it really isn't. there isn't much of a fabric abundance to this, although it is loose (and cool.) i bought an xl, which is my usual size and the fit is fine.

there are 2 layers of fabric. i do not think a cami is needed at all.

i bought this in black and the floral embroidery just pops! i'm just not a white fan due to cleani
Review_ja:
6月のセールで購入しましたが、買って良かったです。

生地が2枚重ねになっているので、キャミは全く必要ないと思います。

黒を購入しましたが、花柄の刺繍がとてもきれいです。

Title: This skirt is so beautiful
Title_ja: このスカートはとても美しいです。
Review: I was returning something to the store. before i stepped out of the store when this skirt caught my eyes. it's such a nice skirt, with the gorgeous red color, beautiful buttons and material that is heavy and thick but soft. i paired it with a white shirt that is currently on sale and fell in love with both matching together. it is tts, i'm 5'5 and 120lb and i usually get 0-2 in size. size 0 was sold out in the store so i tried size 2 and it fits me very well. the length is great, it falls 2-3 in
Review_ja: お店の外に出る前に、このスカートが目に留まりました。華やかな赤色、美しいボタン、重厚で厚みがありながらも柔らかい素材がとても素敵なスカートです。現在セール中の白いシャツと合わせて、両方の組み合わせに惚れ込んでしまいました。

Title: Adorable and comfortable, poor fabric quality
Title_ja: 可愛くて快適、生地の質が悪い
Review:
I tried this blouse on and loved the style, comfort and color of the peach so much that i was preparing to buy it. when i pulled the sleeve the fabric came away from the cuff. i tested another spot pulling only gently and the same thing happened. too bad since the color would have been a great addition for me. 

but--i also tried the blue and it gets 4 stars, as the fabric is much better. it too is adorable, soft and did not tear on gentle testing. the two blouse colors are made from different
Review_ja:
このブラウスを試着して、スタイル、着心地、ピーチの色がとても気に入ったので、購入しようと思っていました。

でも、ブルーも試着してみましたが、生地がもっと良いので、星4つです。こちらも可愛らしく、柔らかく、優しくテストしても破れませんでした。

Review: Love it. goes well with a lot. super soft
Review_ja: とても気に入っています。

Title: Great top for summer!
Title_ja: 夏にぴったりのトップスです。
Review: Cute, easy to wear. perfect little top! will go with so many things. the scalloped shoulders add such a nice touch. i'm a solid 8 with a pretty large chest. i think i need to go up. not sure. about to order a 10 to see if there is a big difference. so, if you have a larger chest you may want to order two sizes.
Review_ja: 肩のスカラップがいいアクセントになっています。私は8号で胸がかなり大きいのですが、もう少し大きい方がいいようです。

Title: Great top!
Title_ja: 素晴らしいトップスです。
Review: Love it to layer. it is not heavy the perfect weight & soft material. my daughters all want to steal it!
Review_ja: 重くなく、ちょうどいい重さと柔らかな素材で、娘たちがこぞって欲しがっています。

Title: Mission impossible
Title_ja: ミッション・インポッシブル
Review: What an adorable and frustrating skirt! i'm not a large person: 32d-26-36. and i ordered my normal size small. this is a pull on skirt, and the waist opening could not accommodate either my shoulders or my hips. in most retailer clothes, i'm either a size 2 or 4; i have to agree with the other reviewer. there is no way to put this item on.
Review_ja: 私は32d-26-36で、普段のSサイズを注文しました。この商品はプルオンスカートで、ウエストの開きは私の肩やヒップを収容することができませんでした。

Title: Great native palm pants
Title_ja: グレートネイティブパームパンツ
Review: These pants are beautiful and so comfortable. the liner is a nice surprise. they can be casual or dressed up with a jacket. i'm so pleased to have gotten them on sale!
Review_ja: このパンツは美しく、とても快適です。ライナーがついているのも嬉しい驚きです。

Review: Ordered a size 0, my usual at retailer... very flattering, fits well
Review_ja: 小売店でいつも使っている0サイズを注文。

Title: Would love the cut but
Review: This was going to be my go to top. i loved the look of the billowy shirt, especially in light blue. when it arrived, i knew it wouldn't work for my body. i'm athletic build with muscular upper arms and a d cup. i tried it on anyway. i really wish it fit. it was snug in the upper arms and pulled a bit in the front. i knew if i ordered a size up the arms would still be tight. it's just the cut of the shirt. this top is best for someone that isn't busty and has slender upper arms.
Review_ja: このシャツが届いたとき、私の体には合わないだろうと思いました。私は筋肉質な上腕とDカップのアスリート体型です。このトップは、バストがなく、上腕が細い人に最適だと思います。

Title: Pretty and flattering dress
Title_ja: かわいくて、着映えのするワンピース
Review: I really love this dress! it's very flattering and comfortable, and all the buttons keep the wrap in check. i've gotten lots of compliments on it. also, it's got pockets!
Review_ja: このドレスが本当に大好きです！とてもお洒落で着心地が良く、ボタンがラップを抑えてくれています。

Title: Not the original!
Review: For those who are wondering this sweater coat is 50% lambswool and 50% acrylic. the original version of this coat was 100% lambswool. 50% acrylic yet the price remained the same???i would have payed more money to have this sweater coat made in 100% lambswool like the original version. this is another example of declining quality and a high price tag for synthetic materials.
Review_ja: このセーターコートは、ラムズウール50％、アクリル50％です。このコートのオリジナルはラムズウール100％ですが、アクリル50％なのに価格は据え置きなのでしょうか？

Title: This dress is perfect for summer!
Title_ja: このワンピースは夏にぴったりです
Review: This dress was love at first sight.  i did have to size down from my normal size but the dress is so comfortable and cool.  as another reviewer said, it does shrink after first wash but perfect now since i am 5'2".  it shrank about one inch in length only.  i got many compliments and my husband said it was beautiful- that's a plus! i was comfortable and cool all day.  get it before it is out of stock.  this dress will not make it to sale.
Review_ja: 他の方のレビューにあるように、最初の洗濯で縮みますが、私は170センチなので、今は完璧です。

Title: Great idea, okay execution
Title_ja: 素晴らしいアイデア、OKな実行
Review:
I have a shorter torso and so i usually love dresses that hit right at my waist- so this dress seemed perfect! 
i ordered a size 2 petite, which fit very well. the regular two (in picture) was not as well made. the straps didn't fit as well. they were less of an "x" and way more fabric. petite fit great. i think this dress is really fun but not very mature. i returned it because it didn't feel adult enough for the event.
Review_ja:
私は胴が短いので、いつもはウエストにぴったりとフィットするドレスが好きなのですが、このドレスは完璧でした。
このドレスは、とても素敵です！私はプチサイズ2を注文したのですが、とてもよく合いました。

Title: Comfy, but not flattering to larger busts
Title_ja: 着心地は良いが、バストの大きい人には不向き。
Review:
I really liked this top-- the red gingham is adorable, and it looked great tucked into the pencil skirt i was also trying on. sadly, it had two things going against it:
- when i didn't tuck it in, it looked like i was hiding an early pregnancy (it just hangs from the chest, and my bust is relatively large-- 34dd)
- the material is awfully thin, and i don't know how it would hold up (that's a concern when you're spending $90 on a "casual" top)
i would certainly consider purchasing this on sale
Review_ja:
私は本当にこのトップが好きだった - 赤いギンガムは愛らしいですし、それは私も試着していた鉛筆のスカートに隠れて素晴らしい見えた。
- 私はそれを押し込まなかったとき、それは私が初期の妊娠を隠していたように見えた（それだけで胸からハングアップし、私のバストは比較的大きいです - 34dd）。
- 素材はとても薄く、どのように持ちこたえるかわかりません(90ドルの "カジュアル "なトップスを購入する際の懸念点です)。
セールで購入することを検討しています。

Title: A unique style ter
Title_ja: ユニークなスタイルのテ
Review: I love wearing this. it is a little slice of summer, which i am desperately hanging on to. the color pops, it's so very comfortable, & the back is a work of art! can be dressed up with a pencil summer skirt, or down with capri style pants.
Review_ja: ポップな色で、とても着心地がよく、背中が芸術作品です！夏のペンシルスカートでドレスアップしても、カプリ・スタイルのパンツでダウンスタイルにしてもいいですね。

Title: Might want to size down
Title_ja: サイズダウンをお勧めします
Review: I just got this in the mail today. it's really cute when i put it on, but it's definitely meant to be worn slightly off the shoulders like the model is showing. i was hoping i could wear it both ways, but then the v-neck becomes way too low. i would recommend sizing down unless you're bigger busted. however, the torso is cut very true to size which might make it hard for some to size down without it becoming too small. a larger bust might help to keep this from falling off the shoulders. i'm not
Review_ja: 着てみるととてもかわいいのですが、モデルさんのように肩から少しはずして着るものなのでしょう。

Title: Perfect fall number
Title_ja: 秋にぴったりなナンバー
Review: This dress is amazing beautiful and perfect for fall. the colors and beading are so much better in person. the pockets are an added bonus! i'm typically a xs but sized up to a s only because i felt the sleeves were tight and across the bust was tighter than i'd like when moving my arms. the xs would have worked but the s is perfect comfort. i highly recommend this beauty. for reference, i'm 5'2, 120 lbs.
Review_ja: このドレスは驚くほど美しく、秋に最適です。色とビーズが人でそんなに良いです。ポケットは追加のボーナスです！私は通常XSですが、私は袖がきつかったと感じたので、Sにのみサイズアップとバストは私の腕を動かすとき私が望むよりもタイトだった。

Title: Quality dress and gorgeous fabric, but frumpy fit
Title_ja: 上質なドレスとゴージャスなファブリック。
Review: This dress has gorgeous fabric and impeccable quality construction! i'm 5'4 118lbs and large busted (32. dd). i am usually an overall size 4 but when buying dresses usually have to purchase a six to accommodate my chest. i ordered a size 4 because that was the only size left and was going to take a chance . it fit perfect across the chest but the overall dress is enormous! does not even slightly silhouette your figure. it is like a giant stiff triangle. i was going to return but was so hesitant
Review_ja: このドレスは、豪華な生地と非の打ちどころのない品質の構造を持っています！私は5'4 118ポンドと大きなバスト（32。dd）です。私は通常、全体のサイズ4ですが、ドレスを買うときは通常私の胸を収容するために6を購入しなければなりません。

Title: Beautiful dress!
Review: This dress is absolutely gorgeous! love, love, love! i am 5'2 and the petite sizing was perfect.
Review_ja: このドレスは本当にゴージャスです！大好き、大好き、大好き！私は170センチですが、プチサイズは完璧でした。

Title: Love this!
Review: This romper is sooo comfortable and cute! it is definitely pretty casual, and probably best used as a beach cover up, as it exposes a lot of skin. that being said, i have worn it out and about on very hot days and felt totally fine. as far as sizing, i usually order a small, and got this in a small and it fit perfectly.
Review_ja: このロンパースはとても快適でかわいいです！それは間違いなくかなりカジュアルで、それは多くの皮膚を露出するように、おそらく最高のビーチカバーアップとして使用されています。

Title: Amazing vest!!!
Review: I love everything about this vest! comfortable and cute, great transition piece into spring.
Review_ja: このベストのすべてが好きです！着心地がよくて、かわいくて、春への移行アイテムとして最高です。

Title: Comfy and classy
Review: This shirt is so soft and luxuriously feeling. the material looks very nice and seems well made. it has a nice length to it, so it can be worn properly with leggings without any worry. i'm a 36d and can't get the button to close properly, so i'd recommend sizing up if this could be an issue for you. overall it will be a very versitile piece i'm excited to add to my wardrobe.
Review_ja: このシャツはとても柔らかく、高級感があります。素材もとても良く、よくできていると思います。

Title: Too big
Review: I ordered a m as the previous review said it ran small. i found it to be very large. i have more curves than the model and also thought it made me look boxy.
Review_ja: 前評判で小さいとあったのでMを注文しました。私はモデルさんより体の線が太いので、箱型に見えると思いました。

Review: I was looking for a dress for my engagement pictures and once i saw this dress i knew it was the one! i ordered the white in a small (size 2) i am 5'4 130lbs. it fits perfect and the length is just right. some reviews said it's boxy and has too much flow to it but if you have the right size it won't be an issue! yes, it's a lace dress so it's going to be delicate and you'll need to handle with care. but it's worth it, absolutely stunning!
Review_ja: 私は私の婚約写真用のドレスを探していたと私はそれが1つであったことを知っていたこのドレスを見た一度！私は小さな（サイズ2）の白を注文しました私は5'4 130ポンドです。それは完璧にフィットし、長さはちょうど良いです。いくつかのレビューはそれが箱型とそれにあまりにも多くの流れを持っているが、あなたはそれが問題ではありません右サイズを持っていれば言った！はい、それはレースのドレスなので、繊細であることが起こるだろうとあなたは慎重に扱う必要があるでしょう。

Title: Gorgeous detail
Title_ja: ゴージャスなディテール
Review: This shirt is gorgeous. i bought it for my engagement party and got lots of compliments. the only thing negative was that the particular shirt i bought had one of the stones on the sleeve that the prongs were bent so it snagged the beautiful embroidery on the front of the shirt.. of course my local retailer exchanged it for a perfect new one without hassle. it's an expensive shirt but perfect for a special occasion.
Review_ja: このシャツは豪華です。私は私の婚約パーティーのためにそれを買って、賛辞の多くを得た。唯一の否定的なことは、私が買った特定のシャツは、突起がシャツの前面に美しい刺繍を引っ掛けたので曲がっていたことを袖に石の一つを持っていたということでした.もちろん私の地元の小売店は手間なしで完璧な新しいものと交換しました.それは高価なシャツだが特別な日のために完璧です.

Review: I disagree with other reviewers on this. it looks a lot better in picture on the model. i found it to run large and not fit in the most flattering way. fabric feels great. i want to love it but it is going back.
Review_ja: 他の方のレビューにあるように、モデルさんの写真ではもっと素敵に見えます。

Title: Beautiful color
Review: I tried this on when i saw it hanging in the dressing room. i was pleasantly surprised by this piece. the color is beautiful - not too yellow - not too brown. i have not worn it yet so i'm assuming it will hold up pretty well considering my other pieces from this designer are still looking good with several wears. i bought this in a small size so it does not hang down like it does on the model. perhaps that's why i don't need a cami underneath.
Review_ja: 黄色すぎず、茶色すぎず、きれいな色です。まだ着用していませんが、このデザイナーの他の作品が何度か着用してもきれいなことを考えると、かなり持ちこたえると思います。

Title: Short; more of an empire waist than photo shows
Title_ja: ショート丈。写真で見るより、エンパイアウエスト。
Review: I'm 5'6" and it hits me at mid-thigh. the top (black/camel version) is sheer enough to need a cami. the waist is quite high. not flattering for me--the empire waist makes me look a bit pregnant--plus i don't want to deal with having to wear a cami.
Review_ja: 私は5'6 "とそれは半ば太ももで私を打つ。トップ（黒/キャメルバージョン）は、キャミを必要とするのに十分な薄さである。

Title: The very good and the very bad
Title_ja: とても良いことと、とても悪いこと
Review:
First of all, the fabric's summery pattern of blossoms, honeybees and butterflies is beautiful and absolutely unique. i love it so much i wish i could afford to keep the dress as an art object. also, with one important exception, the dress is well made. the underslip is the right length and opacity. the dress is not transparent,
which is a big plus. there is a slight greenish cast to the background instead of the pure ivory shown
in the pictures. this makes the color a bit harder to wear. and
Review_ja:
まず第一に、花とミツバチと蝶の夏らしい柄の生地が美しく、とてもユニークです。
写真で見るような純粋なアイボリーではなく、背景がわずかに緑色を帯びているのが特徴です。
このため、少し着にくい色になっています。

Title: So much better in person!!!
Review: I have four kids and a post baby bump that wants to live on forever, so i'm a huge fan of flowy tops--this one looked cute online, but i wasn't sold on it and passed. then i went to the store the next day and saw it, and the colors were more vibrant, so i thought, why not try it on, though i wasn't that excited about it. i tried it on and it was like the shirt was having her cinderalla moment--totally transformed how it looked on me and in person. i love it! it was one of those instant "i'm buyi
Review_ja: 私は4人の子供と永遠に生きたいポストベビーバンプを持っているので、私は流線型のトップスの大ファンです - この1は、オンラインでかわいく見えたが、私はそれに販売されていなかったとパスした。その後、私は次の日に店に行き、それを見て、色がより鮮やかだったので、私はそれについてその興奮ではなかったが、なぜそれを試してみて、考えた。私はそれを試してみて、それはシャツが彼女のcinderalla瞬間を持っていたようだった - 完全にそれは私と人に見えた方法を変換します。

Title: Cute but poorly made
Title_ja: かわいいけど、作りが雑
Review: Weave on the sweater quite open and easily snags . the first day i wore it the seam on the sleeve began to unravel. needed to use a crochet hook to reweave after the first wearing. not confident that it will hold up well to its first wash.
Review_ja: セーターの織りがかなり開いていて、引っかかりやすい。初めて着た日、袖の縫い目がほつれ始めた。

Title: Cute top, but not worth full price
Title_ja: かわいいトップスですが、フルプライスの価値はありません。
Review: I'm a bit disappointed in this top. i'm keeping because retailer's shipping rates are obnoxious and i don't have a store near me. by the time i pay for shipping both ways, i could have paid for 1/2 the shirt. the loft has some very similar tops for about 1/2 the price. i love meadow rue, and their material is fabulous, but the design is off on this one. you can't size down because the armholes and top are fitted, but the bottom is a tent. not my usual style, as i'm short, with a short waist. this
Review_ja: このトップスには少しがっかりです。小売店の送料が不愉快なのと、近くに店がないのでそのままにしています。私はメドウ・ルーが大好きで、その素材も素晴らしいのですが、この商品はデザインが違います。アームホールとトップはフィットしているのに、ボトムはテントなのでサイズダウンできません。

Title: Love this dress!!!
Review: This is a fantastic dress. it's very flowy, comfortable, stylish, and it has pockets!!! whoop! whoop! i have a larger bust (34d) and even though it's button down, the openings in between don't peak open to show your bra. it is navy and red, but i think you could wear black boots with it, no problem. this is my new favorite dress and i'm very happy with my purchase. buy it!!
Review_ja: 私はバストが大きめなので（34D）、ボタンダウンですが、その間の開口部が開いてブラが見えることはありません。

Title: Gorgeous
Review: I love this top. the wine color is beautiful, the fabric is soft, the details are pretty, and it fits perfectly. it is long, and will likely look best with leggings or skinny pants and boots.
Review_ja: ワインカラーが美しく、生地も柔らかく、細部もきれいで、サイズもぴったりです。長さがあるので、レギンスやスキニーパンツ、ブーツに合わせると良さそうです。

Title: Very large; lace is kinda coarse
Title_ja: とても大きい。レースはやや粗い。
Review: Thought i'd love this top; i'm a sucker for lace anything from retailer.  but i found the lace, while pretty, to be quite rough, which to me indicates a lower quality. and i guess i should've known that it would be very swingy (photos show that) but it really overwhelmed me.  for reference, 5'5", 125 lbs, 34d. sad, but this went back.
Review_ja: しかし、私はレースが、きれいながら、私には低品質を示し、かなり荒いことがわかった。と私はそれが非常に揺れるだろうことを知っていたはずだと思う（写真はそれを示している）、それは本当に私を圧倒した。

Title: Too long
Review: Great color, soft fabric, but waaaaay too long. more like a night shirt than a t-shirt.
Review_ja: Tシャツというよりナイトシャツみたい。

Title: Cute spring/summer top
Title_ja: 春夏用キュートなトップス
Review: I was just at the store and purchased this cute top which runs tts for me. i wasn't expecting to find anything at the store but the beautiful lace and adorable tie at the front caught my eye so i bought the small which is my usual size at retailer (34d-27-35) and it fits perfectly. the material is a touch thin but that's okay with me since i don't want heavy clothes for the warmer months anyway. i also don't find this top particularly see through as it's black and will wear a full coverage bra wit
Review_ja: 私はお店で何かを見つけることを期待していなかったが、美しいレースとフロントの愛らしいタイは私の目を引いたので、私は小売店で私のいつものサイズであるSサイズを購入しました（34D-27-35）、それは完璧にフィットします。素材はタッチ薄いが、私はとにかく暖かい季節のために重い服をしたくないので、それは私と一緒に大丈夫です。

Review: I love this shirt. it's different than other summer tops. it's pretty much as pictured in terms of color and size, and runs true to size. on a windy day the front will come open, but only to your stomach.
Review_ja: このシャツが大好きです。他の夏のトップスとは違います。色もサイズも写真通りで、サイズもぴったりです。風の強い日は前が開きますが、お腹のあたりまでです。

Title: Beautiful t-shirt!
Review: Wonderfully soft fabric and gorgeous pattern. the background color is a more standard gray than shows in the on-line photo (which looks more pinkish gray on my screen), but it's just lovely -- looks perfect with jeans or a skirt. i will be wearing this a lot this fall, and will keep a lookout for additional patterns!
Review_ja: この秋はこれをたくさん着ようと思います。

Title: Beautiful dress. small in the bust
Review: This is a find! i am always on the hunt for a unusual lbd so when i found this on a "found and collected rack" i went for it. for starters, i am 5 foot almost 6 inches, and it the length ends just about the same place on this model. i usually wear a size 2 but when i tried on the size available in the store (oo), i felt i only needed a bit higher sizing bc i am small in the chest. i am barely a size 34 a and probably a 30d at best, and i barely can squeeze my chest into this dress at this size!
Review_ja: 私はいつも変わった服を探しているので、"found and collected rack "でこれを見つけたとき、それを手に入れました。私は通常、サイズ2を着用していますが、私は店で利用可能なサイズ（OO）を試着したとき、私は胸に小さいですbcだけ少し高いサイジングを必要とする感じ。

Title: Nice lightweight sweater
Title_ja: 薄手のセーターが良い
Review: I caught this on sale and bought the light pink version. it is very lightweight and delicate. i must admit on taking it out of the box i was a little concerned at the shape / design- but once i tried it on i found it draped beautifully and was really a good buy. it is very unique and i think i could wear it with nice slacks for work or keep it more casual with jeans and a t-shirt on the weekend. the only drawback is that the material is not what you would expect from a sweater- it does feel more
Review_ja: セールで、ライトピンクを購入しました。とても軽くて繊細です。箱から出したときは、形やデザインが少し気になりましたが、着てみると、ドレープが美しく、本当に良い買い物でした。

Title: Perfect dressy t
Title_ja: パーフェクトドレッシーT
Review: This is the perfect little shirt when you want more than an ordinary t-shirt. the pattern on the back panel adds a nice little extra touch. the blue tone is very rich looking, and could be dressed up or down.
Review_ja: バックパネルに施された柄がアクセントになっています。

Title: Beautiful dress, runs large
Title_ja: 美しいドレス、大きめのサイズ
Review: I bought this dress to wear to my low-key backyard rehearsal dinner. the dress it's self is beautiful, good quality, and a perfect summer maxi. however, it was way too big. i'm 5'6, 118 lbs, i typically wear an xs/0 and felt like i was swimming in fabric. i loved the style and make of the dress, so i choose to get it tailored.
Review_ja: しかし、それは大きすぎました。私は5'6、118ポンドだ、私は通常、XS / 0を着用し、私は布で泳いでいたように感じました。

Title: Very soft and flattering
Title_ja: とてもソフトで着心地が良い
Review: I was please with how well this shirt fits, and how flattering it is, while adding a bit of visual interest with the unique neckline.
Review_ja: このシャツは、フィット感があり、着心地がよく、ユニークなネックラインで視覚的な面白さを加えているのがうれしいですね。

Title: Super cozy
Review: Wow great soft feels great but not too clingy. only thing keeping from 5 start is that it will pill some. the sleeves are not fuzzy so they don't pill but body will/does.
Review_ja: 袖は毛羽立たないので、毛玉はできませんが、身頃はできます。

Title: Love it
Review: Skirt fits true to size, i bought a regular size 2 even though im only 5 feet because i didnt want it too short. the size was perfect as it hit right above the knee. bold, vibrant color and great quality! also very unique, which is what i look for at ahtro. recommend, give it a shot!
Review_ja: 大胆で鮮やかな色と素晴らしい品質！また、非常にユニークで、それは私がアフトロで探しているものです。

Title: Cute!
Review: Great with a tank top underneath and jeans. i also wore with a delicate gold necklace. charming!
Review_ja: 下にタンクトップを着て、ジーンズを履くと最高です。また、繊細なゴールドのネックレスと合わせても素敵です。

Title: Beautiful design but fabric falls flat
Title_ja: 美しいデザインだが、生地が平らになってしまう
Review: I found the fit of this dress to be true to size with a flattering bust and waistline; however, the fabric feels cheap and doesn't drape as nicely as i'd hope for the price. this would be a lovely dress in a better quality fabric. for sizing reference, i'm 5'5'', 122 lbs, 30dd, and took my usual size xs - though i'm busty for my size, the top provides nice coverage.
Review_ja: 私はお世辞のバストとウエストラインでサイズに忠実であることが、このドレスのフィットを発見した、しかし、生地は安く感じ、私は価格のために願っていますようにうまくドレープません。

Title: Versatile; size down
Title_ja: 汎用性あり、サイズダウン
Review: Much nicer in person -- the chunky knit reads more gray with black accents than "blue" as described here. there are lovely flecks of rust, blue, goldenrod, green throughout. super soft, stretchy; it's fine sizing down...otherwise the arm holes dip down very low. i'm usually a size 4/small and xs was best for me (33" bust, long torso, broad shoulders). i can see wearing another layer underneath when cold weather sets in.
Review_ja: 錆、青、金色、緑の美しい斑点が全体にあります。超ソフトで伸縮性があり、サイズダウンしても大丈夫です。そうしないと、アームホールがとても低くなります。

Title: Lovely
Review: I purchased this shell in black. the embellishments and construction of the top are of a good quality, like as shown. i am 5'4", 120# and typically purchase an xs. this ran a bit bigger than i was expecting from the reviews, but i am overall happy with the top. the center slit may be too revealing for those with a smaller bust.
Review_ja: 私は170センチ、120キロで、通常XSを購入します。これはレビューから予想していたより少し大きく感じましたが、全体的には満足しています。

Title: Super soft and comfy!
Review: I look at the top quite a few times before i bought it.  i absolutely love it !  it's a super soft thick cotton material,  it drapes perfectly and wears well.
Review_ja: 購入する前に、何度もこのトップスを見ていました。

Title: Perfection!
Review: Love this dress! i can't say enough about it. comfortable, stylish, packable! doesn't wrinkle at all. i love it. i bought the neutral and the turquoise. only planned on keeping one but i love it so much i'm keeping both. good dress for fall/winter to wear with flats or tights and boots. can easily be dressed up or worn casual. i am 5'1" 115 lbs and bought the xs petite. perfect fit. a great price point especially with the 25% off dresses.
Review_ja: このドレスが大好きです！快適で、スタイリッシュで、パッカブル！全くシワになりません。私はニュートラルとターコイズを買いました。1つだけを残すことを計画しましたが、私はそれを愛するので、両方を残しています。

Title: Simple and classic
Title_ja: シンプルでクラシック
Review: I purchased this in the cream/beige color and love that it will go with everything. i can add details with long necklace or scarf-even a belt but it also stands alone and looks great with leggings or skinny jeans. i would also wear with a neutral skirt as shown on model. the fabric is not too thin and with a bit of cashmere will also add some warmth. it may shed some depending if you wear a nylon cami underneath. i purchased the xs, my usual size and fits great. 5'8-slender. love my purchase!
Review_ja: クリーム/ベージュを購入しましたが、何にでも合うので気に入っています。ロングネックレスやスカーフ、ベルトでディテールを加えてもいいですが、単品でレギンスやスキニージーンズに合わせても素敵です。普段のサイズでぴったりです。

Title: Beautiful!
Review: Purchased today at the 30% off summer tag sale. 5'7 and bought the size 6 - fits perfectly. a lovely combination of feminine and boho. will wear with dark jeans a a white tank. fabulous light, pretty summer topper...
Review_ja: 今日、30％オフのサマータグセールで購入しました。フェミニンとボーホーの組み合わせが素敵です。ダークジーンズに白いタンクを合わせます。

Title: Very flattering
Title_ja: とてもきれいな仕上がり
Review: This dress fits to a t! true to size. very flattering. fabric is soft and comfortable.
Review_ja: このドレスは、サイズにぴったりです！とてもお似合いです。

Review: Absolutely love this suit. the bottoms are very comfortable and covers everything id like it to. it does not ride up at all, which almost never happens with swim suits. i'm going to order this in a different color next season. i paired the bottoms with the peplum top and received many compliments.
Review_ja: ボトムスはとても着心地がよく、気になる部分をすべてカバーしてくれます。

Title: Perfect find
Review: I got this for my daughter (teen) who had been wanting this plaid look but didn't want to look like a lumberjack! this is feminine and can be dressed up or down. it has the high low look that she loves and it is comfortable and machine washable! she will get a lot of use out of this purchase! new item but black friday discount! yay! purchased in red color.
Review_ja: このチェック柄を欲しがっていたのですが、木こりのように見えるのは嫌だという娘（10代）のために購入しました！これは女性らしく、ドレスアップもできる。

Title: Throw on and go perfection
Title_ja: 着るだけで、完璧な仕上がり
Review: I'm very picky about jumpers, and this one is abolutely perfect! i love how it looks like a dress at first glance. it runs a little big because of the oversized fit it is supposed to have, i sized down because of the armpit area. nude garments and you'll be fine. this is going to sell out fast, don't wait for it to go on sale! (seriously my store is already out of xs's)
Review_ja: このジャンパーは完璧です！一見するとドレスのように見えますが、オーバーサイズのため少し大きめです。(私の店ではすでにXSは売り切れです。）

Title: Favorite new pants!
Title_ja: お気に入りの新作パンツ
Review: Bought these over the weekend and i am in love! they are very soft, extremely flattering, and the rich green color is fantastic. i may go back for the black. i went with my usual size 28 for reference, and the fit is great. these will be a fall staple, for sure!
Review_ja: 週末に購入しましたが、とても気に入っています！とても柔らかくて、体にぴったりで、リッチなグリーンカラーが素晴らしいです。

Title: Runs so big
Review: I'm a short girl, but i usually wear tops in a small or medium at retailer. for me, i would have needed this shirt in a size at least one notch smaller than even offered. this shirt is adorable. love the details. i wanted it so bad, which is why i paid so much for a basic t-shirt. still, it was large to the point of frumpiness and could have used some sort of scoop or v-neck to break up the dots.
Review_ja: このシャツは愛らしいです。細部が大好きです。私はそれがとても悪いと思ったので、私は基本的なTシャツのためにそんなに支払った理由です。

Title: Cute top
Review: I wasn't excited enough about this to purchase it, but i did like it. i am wearing a medium in the photos and for reference my measurements are 38-30-40.
Review_ja: 写真ではMサイズを着用していますが、参考までに私のサイズは38-30-40です。

Review: I'm writing because i ordered this dress and live it. i'm usually a medium but bc so many said it ran small i ordered a large...it was huge and i wear a 34d. it was huge everywhere. so now hoping the medium fits.
Review_ja: 私は通常Mサイズですが、多くの人が小さいと言ったのでLサイズを注文しました...それは巨大で、私は34Dを着用しています。

Review_ja: この小さなショーツは私のお気に入りになりました。とてもスイートでフェミニン、そしてとても快適です。

Title: Beautiful print and colors

Review_ja: このシャツは本当にきれいな色で、大きめに作られています。

I love jumpsuits for their style and comfort. i loved the look of this blue silky piece, and the review that said it was like lounge wear you could wear out of the house. i agree that it is like lounge wear, but for me, there were a few challenges.

Title: Cute colors, cute tee
Title_ja: かわいい色、かわいいTシャツ
Review: I was really looking forward to these tees working, after reading the reviews. unfortunately, they had slits on the sides that came up higher than i was comfortable showing my sides just above my jeans. trying to keep it age appropriate.
Review_ja: このTシャツは、レビューを読んで、とても楽しみにしていたのですが、残念なことに、サイドにスリットが入っていて、私のジーンズのすぐ上の脇を見せるのに快適な高さまで来ていました。

Title: Must have but....
Review: Absolutely love these pants! i have had these pilcos for about two months now and it has been a staple in my fall wardrobe. i have worn them at least once a week. the only downfall is the button has already fallen off and the seam in the knee has recently torn apart. given the leather, i'm not sure if they can be fixed. these are fabulous, but the quality is just not there. very disappointing.
Review_ja: このパンツが大好きです！2ヶ月ほど前からこのピルコスを持っていて、秋のワードローブの主役になっています。

Title: Perfect for layering

Review_ja: このシャツは少し大きめですが、私は170cmでプチスモールを注文しました、ゆったりしたカーディガンの下に重ねるのに最適です。

Review_ja: 私は170センチ、約120ポンドで、それは私に圧倒されました。私はすべてを試してみました---高いラインを作成するためにウエストでネクタイを引き上げ、ヒールの高さの様々を身に着けている---私はそれを動作させるように見えたことができませんでした。私はアイデアを愛し、写真は愛らしいラインとカットを持っているように見えます。

Title: Pretty but unsure
Title_ja: かわいいけど、よくわからない
Review: I love how unique this vest is. i'm still figuring out how to wear it in a feminine way, as it lacks shape at the waist and the collar sometimes doesn't behave. i think the sweater texture makes it more casual, but i could belt it and wear with fancier shoes to glam it up. it is a nice third piece to keep warm for fall or winter--hopefully i"ll wear it more once i figure it out!
Review_ja: このベストのユニークさが大好きです。ウエストのシェイプが足りないのと、襟が時々お行儀悪くなるので、女性らしく着る方法をまだ考えています。セーターの質感がよりカジュアルにしてくれると思いますが、ベルトをして、ファンシーな靴と合わせて華やかにすることもできます。

Title: Comfy jeans
Review: These jeans run true to size, very comfy and i love the frayed bottoms
Review_ja: このジーンズはサイズがぴったりで、とても履き心地がよく、裾のフレイド加工が気に入っています。

Review_ja: このドレスはゴージャスで、実物はもっとアイボリーです。今はクロップド丈のジーンズジャケットとレギンスで着ていますが、近々サンダルでも着れそうです。

Title: Ugly shirt

Review_ja: このシャツは、本当に魅力的ではありません。

Title: Huge

Review_ja: 本当にかわいい作品ですが、サイズが大きいです。XXSのプチサイズを注文しましたが、残念ながら非常に幅が広く、お世辞にも良いとは言えませんでした。返品します。

Title: Love this!
Review: Super cute and comfortable! soft fabric drapes nicely. i wear this with an orange skirt, white shirts or jeans. i get lots of compliments on this top and get more use out of it than expected! i'm so glad i tried it on! a nice surprise.
Review_ja: オレンジのスカートや白いシャツ、ジーンズと合わせています。このトップスを着ていると、たくさん褒められるし、予想以上に使えます！試着してよかったです。

Review_ja:
このドレスは、ポストカードのカタログで見て、すぐに興味を持ったので、お店で見たときに着てみようと思いました。
レースは丈夫で引っかかりにくく、シャンブレーはしっかりした生地なのに軽い。

Title: Flattering cut
Review: This dress has become a favorite in my rotation. the cut and print flatter my body and accentuate my waist. the print is subtle enough to pair with bold accessories.
Review_ja: このドレスは、私のお気に入りのローテーションになりました。

Review: Great staple item. i have it in multiple colors and like them all. easy to add statement necklace to change up the look. wear it under cardi or jacket to make it not look 'tent' like.
Review_ja: カーディガンやジャケットの下に着て、テント風にならないようにしました。

Review: I love this tee! while it is true to size i feel, it is meant to have a loose fit. that being said, it is a very flattering cut and has a great drape. super comfy, flattering and classic.

Title: High waist and seemed to run small on me

I bought this on a whim.  i have a difficult time finding a great fitting suit, especially online!  

this suit is structured so well.  the material will seemingly last way longer than most of my other suits that are priced much higher.  the material i feel holds in my stomach. i have a large bust and it is comfortably supported in this.   

the design is so cute and i love the way the way crisscrossed.  it makes a one piece feel less like a one piece.

このようなデザインはとてもかわいらしく、交差した形がとても気に入っています。

Review_ja:

Review_ja: このドレスは、生地とデザインで私のフロリダでのライフスタイルにぴったりです。

Title: Gorgeous and useful

Love this blouse. per the previous review, there was no problem with my tailoring. it is exactly as shown. i plan to handwash this and take super good care of it. you can tell from the picture it could be an excellent wardrobe staple and absolutely timeless as well as the kind of sexy and elegant you can get away with in the office.

This is the weirdest, greatest material. it feels as soft and as buttery as leather, but doesn't look like leather. it looks more like coated denim. only lighter. and stretchy. so you don't get the vibe you get from the vast majority of vegan leather--thick, rubbery junk trying to masquerade as the real thing.

also gorgeous: the cut. it's straight and slim, but with pleats so hip-less ladies like me look like we have some shape.

i got my regular size, and they fit beautifully, but they are not

Title: Fun summer skirt

Title: Simple and pretty
Review:
I love this blouse, it looks great under a blazer dressed up and great with boyfriend jeans.
it is loose and flowy, the neck line is low. i bought a medium and it is a little large but fits with the style of the top.
i happen to love the fabric, it is soft and feels great on the skin. one of my favorite fabric combinations is rayon (viscose) and cotton.

Title: Nice design but quality isses

Review_ja: このジャケットを試着したところ、確かに可愛かったのですが、いくつか注意点があります。ウールとアクリルの混紡で、店頭で試着した時点ですでにピリングが始まっていました。

Title: Gold thread
Review: This is a very pretty sweater, a bit boxy and short but cute. i am 5'1" and ordered the regular xs in black. the thing i did not like about this sweater was the gold thread through the back lace. i would have kept this if it was plain black lace. just did not like that look.
Review_ja: このセーターの気に入らなかった点は、背中のレース部分に金糸が入っていることです。

Title: Darling and sophisticated
Title_ja: ダーリンと洗練された

i cut the tags to wear it and found out that part of the embroidery on one of the designs had unraveled!
sadly returning.

残念ですが、返品します。

Title: Love this skirt!

Review_ja: 昨日このスカートを買いました。とても気に入っています。

Title: Very nice dress
Review: I ordered my usual size 6 from retailer and it fit perfect. for reference i am 5'8" and 137 pounds. unlike the other reviewer i did not have trouble getting into or out of dress. it buttons down the middle so you just need to make sure you undo them enough to get past your chest;) i really like this dress. i think it's beautifully made. is it my favorite dress i've purchased from retailer, no but still a nice dress:)
Review_ja: 他の方のレビューとは違い、着脱に苦労はしませんでした。真ん中にボタンがあるので、胸元を通るくらいにボタンを外す必要があります;) このドレスは本当に気に入っています。）

Title: Beautiful top!
Review: I absolutely love this top! i often shop the sale items first, but when i saw this top in the store, i didn't hesitate to pay full price. the material reminds me of vintage clothing - it is a dry clean only item, but is so special that it's worth it. the colors and construction (beautifully lined, bias trim) are impressive. and, this top looks better on me than on the model:)
Review_ja: このトップが絶対に好きです！私はよくセール品を最初に買いますが、このトップが店頭にあったときは、迷わずフルプライスで買いました。素材がヴィンテージ服を思わせるので、ドライクリーニングのみの商品ですが、その価値があるほど特別です。

Review: This jacket is perfect for fall! lightweight and easily worn over other tops or layers. looks great with jeans!
Review_ja: このジャケットは秋にぴったりです！軽くて、他のトップスやレイヤードの上に簡単に着ることができます。

Title: Aquaflora vest
Title_ja: アクアフローラベスト
Review: So much prettier in person. love it! i'm a size 2 in retailer and a small in this vest, even over a sweater still left quite a bit of room.
Review_ja: 実物はもっときれいです。大好きです！私は小売店で2号、このベストはSサイズで、セーターの上からでもかなり余裕がありました。

Title: True red, true beauty.
Review: These pants are gorgeous--the fabric has a satiny stretch that simply feels decadent on. i tried on the size 0 and 2 and though they both fit, the size 2 was more flattering (i'm 5' 8" 120lbs). compared to cartonnier's capris (which i love and wear a size 4 in), the fabric and construction on these is superior. and the color is knockout red.
Review_ja: このパンツはゴージャスです。生地はサテンのようなストレッチが効いていて、履くと退廃的な気分になります。サイズ0と2を試着しましたが、どちらもフィットしましたが、サイズ2の方がよりお洒落でした（私は180cm120lbs）。

Title: Fun take on plaid
Title_ja: チェック柄を楽しくアレンジ
Review: I was looking for a red and black plaid top with a twist, and this tee definitely fits the bill! i plan to wear this shirt with a long sleeve tee under it for extra warmth for casual holiday events, and can see it with a skirt and cardi for work. fabric is soft and comfortable. fit is loose but not too boxy.
Review_ja: 赤と黒のチェック柄のひねりの効いたトップスを探していたのですが、このTシャツは間違いなくその条件に合っています！このシャツの下に長袖のTシャツを着て、休日のカジュアルなイベントのために余分な暖かさを得る予定ですが、仕事のためにスカートやカーディガンとの組み合わせも考えています。

Title: Love the color & style, but....
Title_ja: 色＆スタイルが好き、でも...。
Review: I ordered this in the mauve and it's a really pretty lilac color. unfortunately, the fabric is very thin and you can see your bra right through it. my usual size fit great in the shoulders and bust area, but goes downhill from there. the top is cut wide under the armpits and just hangs funny in front. based on the model picture, i thought this would be a little more form fitting in the front. it's also very long. completely covers my butt in the back and then some. could of been a beautiful tank
Review_ja: モーブを注文しましたが、ライラック色がとてもきれいです。残念ながら、生地がとても薄く、ブラジャーが透けて見えます。

Title: Size 16 cut inconsistently, too small
Title_ja: 16号サイズのカットが不揃い、小さすぎる
Review: This top was a big disappointment. i ordered two of the grey motif with the print of the forest animals in size 16. neither of them fit well, but one was cut much smaller than the other. i've had this problem with all of the numerically-sized buttondown style of maeve tops. i don't understand why in size 14 & 16, this keeps happening. that's why i purchase two of each. usually one fits and the other doesn't. this time, unfortunately, neither worked. they both were too tight in the arms/shoulders
Review_ja: このトップはとても期待はずれでした。グレーを基調とした森の動物たちのプリントの16号を2つ注文しましたが、どちらもうまくフィットせず、1つは他のものよりかなり小さめにカットされていました。

Title: Gorgeous spring blouse!
Title_ja: 華やかな春のブラウス!
Review: So stunning, i had to have it for my spring wardrobe! fits true to size and fits well in the bust and is looser on the bottom. the model weara it just as it fits on me. if you have a large bust you may need to size up as the fabric isn't stretchy.
Review_ja: とても魅力的で、私の春のワードローブには欠かせません！サイズはジャストで、バストはぴったり、下はゆったりしています。
